text: The Bhar are a Hindu caste found in North India. They are also known as Rajbhar.People of India Uttar Pradesh Volume XLII Part One edited by A Hasan & J C Das pages 268 to 271 Like others from other castes, Baijnath Prasad Adhyapak was influenced by the Arya Samaj movement when he released Rajbhar Jati ka Itihas in 1940. This book made an effort to demonstrate that the Rajbhar were once kings who were descended from the Bhar tribe. ==References== Category:Castes
title: Bhar caste
